resources.string:
A new bicycle? 
A flat tire? 
A taxi bike, betjak, rickshaw, tricycle or hire a promo bicycle? 
In need of a bike messenger? 
 
Stop by the store or contact us via phone or email. 
We will gladly answer all your questions.

From Monday till Friday: 
09u30 – 12u30 en 13u30 – 18u30 
Saturday until 17u00 
Closed Tuesdays, Sundays and holidays
